description: The Suke Suke no Mi (Clear-Clear Fruit) is a Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible, making them a Clear Human.

techniques.description: User can make themselves and objects they touch completely invisible.

strengths: Complete invisibility for stealth and surprise attacks
Can make other objects and people invisible by touching them
Difficult to defend against invisible attacks
weaknesses: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Can still be detected by Observation Haki or other non-visual means
User must maintain contact to keep objects invisible

description: Due to Brook's extremely lightweight skeleton body, he is able to run across the surface of water without sinking.

techniques.description: Brook runs across the ocean's surface at high speed.

strengths: Allows water travel without a boat
Useful for quick repositioning in naval battles
weaknesses: Must maintain constant movement to avoid sinking

description: Hildon possesses bat-like wings that allow him to fly and suspend himself upside down, characteristic of his vampire-like zombie form.
